emotion.

Hey, can we get a picture here or what?
We're making memories here, baby.
Okay, everyone smile.

Mom, we look horrible.
I like it. It looks like us.

translation.en: Well, I guess this is it.
translation.fr: Bon, je crois qu'on y est.

translation.en: Hey, Dad, you subscribed to my YouTube channel? Thanks. I'm surprised you even figured out how.

translation.en: Katie, please. After all that, I'm a computer expert.

translation.en: Am I doing this right? Should I update my software?

translation.en: Just hit "enter"! Hit "enter"!
[screams] I accidentally ordered 12 Swiffers on Amazon! What did I--
You know, uh, no problem at all.
Thanks. It… it means a lot to me.
Hey. Don't let the world make you normal while I'm gone, okay?
translation.fr: Laisse pas le monde te rendre normal.

translation.en: I never will.
I'll call you every week.
Deal. Raptor bash? [snarls]
For life. [snarls]
-Come here, you little goober. -[laughing] Put me down.
-Goodbye, you king of kings. -[panting]
Thanks for being the best mom in the world.

translation.en: We love you, honey.
Oh, and here, to remember us.
Every horrible picture we've ever taken.
Thanks. It's… it's heavy.
I know.
[clears throat] Wish we didn't have to go, but, uh…
Good luck, uh, finding your people.
translation.fr: mais bonne chanceavec ta nouvelle famille.

translation.en: Dad, come on.
You guys are my people.
So, you know, when I'm sad to be alone…
translation.fr: Donc tu sais,quand je me sentirai trop seule,

translation.en: I'll always have
my favorite thing.
Do you remember how a moose says I love you?
translation.fr: Tu te souvienscomment on dit "je t'aime" en élan ?

translation.en: Don't laugh. You're supposed to be sad.
translation.fr: Rigole pas. Tu es censé être triste.

translation.en: Come here.
Mom, you're hugging too tight.
You love it. You love it!
[chuckles] I do love it.
We're setting up the Slip 'N Slide tomorrow. -You in? -Oh yeah. Definitely.

translation.en: -[computer ringing] -Hold on. I'm getting a call.
translation.fr: Carrément ! Je vous laisse, j'ai un appel.

translation.en: Thanks again for saving the world, K-Bones! No problem, Dirk.
translation.fr: - Merci d'avoir sauvé le monde !- De rien.

translation.en: That's my Katie. Are you eating enough? How's classes?

translation.en: Are you and Jade official, and will you bring her home for Thanksgiving?
translation.fr: C'est officiel avec Jade ?Elle vient pour Thanksgiving ?

translation.en: Oh, easy, Mom. It's only been a few weeks.
translation.fr: C'est officiel avec Jade ?Elle vient pour Thanksgiving ? Ça fait que quelques semaines.J'ai bonne mine ?

translation.en: Also, do I look okay?

translation.en: I've been… [groaning] …sick lately.
Oh my gosh! She's dead! -Call 911! -[laughing]

translation.fr: J'ai pris un cours sur les filtres.

translation.en: Oh, you. That is so creative.
You know, speaking of which, you inspired your dad.
translation.fr: Au fait, tu as inspiré ton père.

translation.en: I got on that, uh, YouTube.
translation.fr: Je t'ai envoyé une demande sur YouTube.

translation.en: I, uh, sent you a friend request. Why didn't you… why didn't you accept it?

translation.en: Oh, that's what this is.
translation.fr: J'ai cru que c'était un psychopathe.

translation.en: I thought a psychopath wrote this.

translation.en: Sure, I'll… I'll accept your friend request, Dad.
translation.fr: SOIS MON AMI SUR INTERNET ! Bien sûr que j'accepte.

translation.en: Hey, where's Aaron?
Oh, let me just show you.
[Linda] Hey, Aaron. Wanna show your sister who you're talking to?

translation.en: What? No. I'm not doing anything! [screams]

translation.en: Sorry. Force of habit.
-[Eric, Deborahbot] Hello, slovenly girl. -[chuckles] Hey, guys.

translation.en: Looks like we got some clothes here for a little gentleman.
[Aaron] The prophecy has been fulfilled!
So, guys, I guess we're receiving some Congressional Medal of Honor or something.

Do you guys want to fly or…

♪ Crushing robots with my family ♪
